title: WTB: Low Grade PC796 Wagner, PC796 Cobb

posts.post_title: WTB: Low Grade PC796 Wagner, PC796 Cobb

posts.post_content:
[quote name="Umphress22" post=2139005]Show me low grade PC796’s[/QUOTE]

Not sure if you would consider their multi-player card which features the famous image of the two shaking hands during the 1909 World Series, but LOTG has a nice looking example in their current auction. (Not my card)

[url]https://bid.loveofthegameauctions.com/bids/bidplace.aspx?itemid=24288[/url]
